0.0.pre_effect_script: v.character_p = 0; v.character_p = (c.owning_entity -> query.is_item_name_any('slot.armor.head','gm1_ord:transform_helmet_sonic')) ? 0 : v.character_p; v.character_p = (c.owning_entity -> query.is_item_name_any('slot.armor.head','gm1_ord:transform_helmet_tails')) ? 1 : v.character_p; v.character_p = (c.owning_entity -> query.is_item_name_any('slot.armor.head','gm1_ord:transform_helmet_knuckles')) ? 2 : v.character_p; v.character_p = (c.owning_entity -> query.is_item_name_any('slot.armor.head','gm1_ord:transform_helmet_shadow')) ? 4 : v.character_p; v.character_p = (c.owning_entity -> query.is_item_name_any('slot.armor.head','gm1_ord:transform_helmet_amy')) ? 3 : v.character_p;
